item.description:
Transformational Breathwork Group.

Session lasts about 2 hours. 15-20 min introductory talk and meditation. About 1-1.5 hr breathing. 15 min-to as much as needed: grounding, sharing, tea.

To read more about Transformational Breathwork please check meetup intro & board,
Living in Bliss and Why Breathwork?


For session: wear comfortable clothes.
I have yoga mats, pillows and blankets, but feel free to bring your own.
Refrain from heavy meal 1 hour prior to breathwork.


What you may expect from session:

  • Stress reduction, centering, balance.
  • Powerful transformational insights.
  • Self-healing meditative states.
  • Physical and emotional therapeutic effects.
  • Clearing and purification on physical and spiritual level
  • Clarity and resolutions about one's life purpose.
  • Sense of renewal.
  • Emerging clearer, lighter, integrated in your body.



10 consecutive sessions recommended
for best cumulative effect, if you want to accelerate your
personal growth and learning and become comfortable doing
breathwork on your own. This unique, simple and accessible
healing and spiritual growth modality will become your natural lifestyle.


Please be on time. This is important. If this is your first breathwork session, and you're more than 10 minutes late, we won't be able to accommodate you, and will regretfully ask to come next time,
no exceptions.


Group session fees:
$30, suggested offering.
$20 when signed for 10 sessions.
Payment plans and skills exchange available.
Nobody ever turned away for the lack of funds.



Feel free to
EMAIL me,
or call 617-388-7565

Loves, see you soon.
item.how_to_find_us: Stairs to the 2nd floor on your left, elevator is on your right. When on the 2nd floor, follow through the hall: BodyMind Integration center studio is on your right.
item.name: Transformational Breathwork Group
